This game is such a huge mind wrenching 3d puzzle...  the graphics are insanely eye-candy... the storyline is definately one that inspires you to love science.  

In November 2016, I nominated this one for the "WhoooAAAAAAA, Dude!" steam award. [i]"Some games melt your face. Maybe it was a crazy plot twist. Maybe you just got your wisdom teeth removed. Either way, this game BLOWS YOUR MIND."[/i]

:2016trophy:

In November 2017, I nominated this game for the “Suspension of Disbelief” Award.  [i]"Let’s be honest: games can have some pretty ridiculous elements in them… from the stories that drive the action, to the items required to conquer obstacles, to even the protagonists themselves. This award is for the game that has a key component, which when described out of context, seems totally insane, but while playing the game doesn’t even make you bat an eye, because in the moment it makes total sense."[/i]

:2017trophy:

In 2018, I nominated this game for the “Best Environment” Award.
[i]All those chatty cutscenes, all those reminders that they need a health pack again. Let's face it, characters are overrated. As this winner illustrates, sometimes breathtaking scenery tells a better story than a thousand big-mouthed heroes.[/i]

传送门系列是我最喜欢的解谜游戏，通过传送门进行空间穿梭的方式非常有创意。2代有着完整剧情，很多陷阱都是放在解密以外的剧情中，我玩的时候遇到几次剧情杀。赶路的时候有些地方没有明显标记，经常找不到路。原版和模组玩了很多，对于各种套路都很了解。创意工坊里有很多谜题，多到几乎玩不完。创意工坊里谜题数量很多，但是质量也参差不齐，有的很难很有意思，有的只是无脑把解密过程变得很长，但是难度却很简单。传送门可以在闲的时候玩一玩，又不像其他有毒游戏一样玩一下一天就过去了。
极佳的游戏，没有什么缺点，值得一玩

以前我一直觉得解谜游戏要靠无穷和难度的谜题偷走玩家的时间。
现在依然这么觉得。
但《传送门2》不仅仅如此。
10/10

Probably one of the best puzzle games ever!

When it comes to puzzle games, Portal 2 easily takes the cake (haha get it?).

[b]The Graphics[/b]
Even by today's standards, this game looks amazing. It has its own unique style that looks great no matter how old it is. Plus performance is butter smooth.

[b]The Story[/b]
Possibly the best story I've ever been told by a video game. The story is told with absolutely no cutscenes, a unique method at the time. Telling a story in a puzzle game is incredibly difficult because if a player gets stuck in one section of a puzzle too long, they might lose immersion. However, Valve nails the story aspect flawlessly.

[b]The Gameplay[/b]
Valve has created a brilliant puzzle that actually relies on thinking. This might sound obvious, but many puzzle games feign difficulty by making certain puzzle aspects difficult to spot. Portal 2 makes sure that all aspects of the puzzle are clearly visible and makes sure each function is clearly defined. Pressing a button releases a cube. Standing here makes you jump higher. Every item has a clear and simple purpose, but its up to you to string them together to beat the puzzle.

[b]Great Concept. Brilliant Execution.
10/10[/b]
A Great Puzzle Game With A Greater Plot Behind It!
